OpenSearchDescription.Description: This extension installs Pixabay's search engine in the browser and allows to search Public Domain / Creative Commons CC0 photos directly form the search bar.
OpenSearchDescription.Tags: opensearch, pixabay, photos, images, pics, pictures, public domain, creative commons
